summary: Completed comprehensive re-verification testing of City Medicos medical store website. All features are working perfectly - navigation, mobile responsiveness, call-to-action buttons, and all 7 pages function as designed.
passed_tests: Home page loads with all 7 required sections (Hero, About, Categories, Delivery, Trust, Store, CTA)
Header navigation works - all 5 nav links (Home, About, Services, Store, Contact) navigate correctly
All Call Now buttons correctly link to tel:9873341450 (hero, delivery, CTA, header)
All WhatsApp buttons link to correct WhatsApp URL with pre-filled messages (hero, delivery, CTA, header)
About page (/about) renders with proper content and navigation
Services page (/services) shows all 6 service categories
Store page (/store) displays address, phone number, timings, and Google Maps embed
Contact page (/contact) has Call, WhatsApp, and Home Delivery cards - NO forms present
Privacy Policy page (/privacy-policy) renders successfully
Terms page (/terms) renders successfully
Footer contains 10 working links as expected
Mobile responsive design - hamburger menu button appears on mobile
Mobile menu opens and closes properly with all navigation options
All 6 product categories displayed correctly (Medicine, Ayurveda, Surgical, Cosmetics, Baby Products, Doctor Support)
Brand colors (Orange #FF4A1C, Green #1BAA5E) used consistently throughout
Swiss Medical Vitality design system properly implemented
Outfit + DM Sans fonts loading correctly
Call-first design approach maintained - no online ordering forms anywhere
Free home delivery messaging prominent throughout site
Google Maps integration working on Store page
